name: Mooncocoon Shrouds the Form
simple_desc: When Netherwing is on the field, it acts as backup for allies. Allies' current HP can be reduced down to a minimum of 1, after which Netherwing will bear the DMG received or the HP consumed.
desc: When Netherwing is on the field, it acts as backup for allies. When allies take DMG or consume HP, their current HP can be reduced down to a minimum of 1, after which Netherwing will consume HP at #1[i]% of the original value until Netherwing disappears.
